title: "Pioneering Video AI Startup, ShortTok, Announces Jayan Eledath as Chief Technology Officer to Accelerate Innovation and Drive Growth"
excerpt: "ShortTok, an early-stage software company developing automated visual storytelling technologies, announces today that it will appoint Jayan Eledath as its new CTO. Jayan Eledath is coming from Amazon where he spent the last seven years leading the applied science teams that built the AI for AWS' Just Walk Out Technology."
